text:
Hello everyone.
Happy to join this nice community. I am a Tech Project Manager at PayPugs (Fin-tech start-up) and (f) Founder of Dyutcon (InformationTechnology newborn start-up).
I am here to explore all the dev features and tech parts of HubSpot to make the life of our/my team easy.

Thanks! :face_with_cowboy_hat:
